website_summaries.verdict: This durable and cute Supergirl plushie is just the right height for young DC Comics fans to play super heroes during the day and cuddle with when it’s time for bed.
pros: Some of Supergirl’s friends like Superman, Batman, and Wonder Woman are also available
cons: Some DC Comics plushies are more expensive than others

customer_reviews.title: SUPER Cute
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Superman and Supergirl, so anything fun and collectible you have to have. Supergirl is so cute and cuddly. Any kid who has this toy in bed with them is guaranteed to have super dreams of saving the world or being protected from nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Porrazzo

customer_reviews.title: Gift for grandaughter
customer_reviews.text: Giving as gift to child. Very soft with bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Compton

customer_reviews.title: Super soft!
customer_reviews.text: Batman was love at first sight! My nearly 4 year old won't let go of this guy. It's the perfect size - a little bigger than I expected but not excessively large, about torso length for my average sized son. The best feature is that it's surprisingly soft. The material is silky fleece and the stuffing is squishy. I'd say it's on the understuffed side, perfect for bedtime but not great for posing and sitting. I've purchased similar dolls in the past and was very happy with them, but none were as soft as this one. I'm very happy with my purchase and will be back for other characters.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Best Batman Plush!
customer_reviews.text: When my little one was walking around with Spiderman calling him Batman I knew just the perfect birthday gift for him. He absolutely loves his Batman, amazing quality and love how it’s so big!
customer_reviews.author: Janine Q

customer_reviews.title: I am Batman
customer_reviews.text: If you want a Batman plush for any reason, do not hesitate with this one. It is a good size, super soft, and the stitching holds up to good amounts of play. Even with vigorous play we have had no issues with any tearing or separation along seams (going on having had for two years and two boys playing with it). It is rare to find items this well made now-a-days. If you are looking for the iconic look of Batman, this is the plush for you.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: My 5 yr old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my son. He loved it. Especially the size lol I initially thought it would be to big for him but it's perfect. I love the smerk on his face lol
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Really good detail
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this Batman doll/stuffy! It's great quality and there's good attention to detail (he's got a little smirk in the smile). Well proportioned and he's kept his shape despite a lot of rough and tumble action from our 3 year old. It goes all over the house with him, and Batman does all his own stunts. Only small issue I've seen is that his cape is a dog hair magnet! So he gets hit with the lint roller every few days & he looks good as new. Definitely recommend & I'm looking into other characters from this line!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Tarkowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for batman kids!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 yo LOVES batman and this was his favorite birthday present and he now sleeps with it every night. It was larger than I expected and he loves that batman is so big. Well made and has withstood being dragged all over the place :D
customer_reviews.author: Megan Drake

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stuffed Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughter's "Santa" gift this year and she's in LOVE! It would be nice if there wasn't such a huge tag on the leg but she didn't even notice and she loves running around with him while wearing her cape and fighting crime. We haven't had to wash him yet but the toy is good quality and I think it'll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grandsons
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson, he LOVES it... he usually carries the newest around until a new one comes along..... i have to admit, i just got him the 22" tall sonic so im sure he will replace the Flash for a min. LOL. but GREAT GIFT for little ones..
customer_reviews.author: James Chipman

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy, Great Size and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my one year old and he loves it. He sleeps in the crib with it and loves hugging it. The toy is well made and is nearly as tall as my one year old. It is also safe as it has no buttons or long hair that can pulled out. It is a very good value in the somewhat pricey licensed character plush market.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Brown

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PURCHASE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME!!!! It is unbelievably soft and the perfect size for cuddling, or pretend play. We purchased this for our granddaughter and she absolutley loves it!!!! It is well made and the colors are vibrant. I am beyond pleased with this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed and has them all with the exception of the joker. These are awesome, very huggable, every time she sees them her eyes get wide and she gets super excited and laughs. She started really reacting to them at 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Madell Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed and has them all with the exception of the joker. These are awesome, very huggable, every time she sees them her eyes get wide and she gets super excited and laughs. She started really reacting to them at 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Madell Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed and has them all with the exception of the joker. These are awesome, very huggable, every time she sees them her eyes get wide and she gets super excited and laughs. She started really reacting to them at 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Madell Collins

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed and has them all with the exception of joker. These are awesome, very huggable, every time she sees them her eyes get wide and she gets super excited and laughs. She started really reacting to them at 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Madell Collins

customer_reviews.title: "Wonder" fully ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: As a fan of DC Comics and their superheroes/heroines, I love anything that I can get. I got curious about this seller and their products. The curiosity has paid off. I have "Wondy" and Supergirl...and they are so cute and adorable with their colorful super suits and smiles. Any kid or kid at heart would love to have these toys. Will hopefully be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Porrazzo

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing! I only took away a star because the cape is not removable. He was getting tangled in it when he slept, so I cut it off. 😬 otherwise very soft and lovable!
customer_reviews.author: JSG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and well loved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Superman doll for my grandsons, aged 4 and 2, to keep at Nana’s house. They were constantly fighting over it, so I ordered a the Batman version. For some reason, they still both wanted Superman, so I ended up ordering another Superman. Great quality and well loved.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Batman
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved it and so did my son for his birthday i bought 3 two for decor for his bday party and the other for him and he just loved it takes it with him everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought Spidey and Batman for my 2 yr old grandson's birthday. His older brother says he wants the same "guys" for his next birthday. They loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow 😁
customer_reviews.text: If you can find it for a decent price there is no better gift for a child (or adult) It will bring a huge smile to anyone who receives it. Unique, especially at large size although medium size is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: opinionated

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BATGIRL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME Batgirl!!!! It is unbelievably soft and the perfect size for cuddling with, or pretend play. It is well made and the colors are vivid. I am beyond pleased with this purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: Santa gave this to my Batman obsessed three yr old. He loves it. Batman has been toted all over, running errands and shopping and to show and tell. Batman has held up nicely. Santa would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: "Mama D"

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 3 months old daughter loves this. It’s very soft and well made. She coos and smiles at Wonder Woman every time she sees her, and she also hugs her every time she has a chance. Get it! You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Madell Collins

customer_reviews.title: Made my sick niece smile
customer_reviews.text: My niece has been sick for days. She hasn't eaten, can barely drink anything, and has been very sad. I had this delivered to her and my sister said it was the first time she has smiled in days. Glad she likes it and it is huge for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batman
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves this Batman doll. He was thrilled at his birthday party when he saw it. Carries it to bed every night and plays with him all day. The doll is a quality product and I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than expected, but thats a great thing. My boy loves it, and is soft enough to cuddle and sleep with
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: He's Batman!
customer_reviews.text: This is being dragged everywhere right now. Batman fiend of a child loves it. I did have to make a quick reinforcement of his back seam day 1 but considering how hard he is loved, not too troubled.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Big Batman doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll is much bigger than I thought it would be, which is my fault because I could have pulled out a tape measure. It's almost as tall as my 3 year old! That said, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's BATMAN
customer_reviews.text: It's BATMAN so he is perfect of course! He is soft, his cape is amazing and he is totally poseable. Get yourself a dark knight to protect your bedroom and dreams from nightmares.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Very SUPER Woman!
customer_reviews.text: She’s large and colorful. Very well made. Was outside for 1 month and did not fade or have any damage.

customer_reviews.title: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Batman plush doll

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Purchase for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: It was very large and super fluffy. The legs and arms were kind of thin, but it was a perfect plush for a 4 year old to sleep with!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my four year old son and he LOVES IT! Sleeps with it. Plays with it. Big and soft, just like we wanted!

customer_reviews.title: Soft and huggable

customer_reviews.title: Much larger and nicer than expected

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute.

customer_reviews.text: My son loves Superman! He sleeps with this every night! Very well made! Perfect size! Great Quality. If your kid loves Super Heroes - this would make a fun gift!!!

product_meta.title: Animal Adventure | DC Comics Justice League | Supergirl | 21" Collectible Plush, Red
product_meta.description: nimal Adventure introduces popular DC characters as soft toys for playtime and cuddle time. Wonder Woman, Superman, Batman, Harley Quinn, Flash, Batgirl, and the Joker are made using ultra-soft fabrics. Each soft toy is based on the comic book characters and all are sure to become lifelong friends for children of all ages.
feature_bullets: DC COMICS JUSTICE LEAGUE: Each soft-toy is based on the comic book characters and all are sure to become lifelong friends for children of all ages.
YOUR ULTRA SOFT SUPER-HERO BUDDIES: Each is made with ultra-soft fabrics, making it perfect for cuddling and playing!
BE IMAGINATIVE: Save the day as one of the Heroes or create mischief as a Villain by collecting all eight!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars17 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
